last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: A lonely man dreams of winning his local pub quiz every week for a year. But first he needs to find a new team member.

name: Trivia
overview: Trivia is a six part TV series for prime time RTE 1 about the captain of a pub quiz team – a man who knows it all but hasn’t learned a thing. It's a funny and charming comedy about a belated male coming-of-age and his thirty-something friends coping with modern life in a small town.
